casebody.data:
Oscar JENKINS, Mary Jenkins, Laura B. Jones, Esther Mae Sessomes, and Willie Mae Jenkins, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. ESSO STANDARD OIL CO., Defendant-Appellee. No. 21, Docket 25028. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 7, 1958. Decided Oct. 7, 1958. Bernard Meyerson, Brooklyn, N. Y. (Morris A. Weiss, Brooklyn, N. Y., on-the brief), for plaintiffs-appellants. George S. Pickwick, New York City (Garvey & Conway, New York City, on: the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, MEDINA and LUMBARD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
